CSprojects.title: Unity Script/PlayerController
CSprojects.description: Player Controller script made for Unity in C#(self-made). Can be used for basically any game that is a First Person Shooter. Poor functioning with Third Person games.

CSprojects.title: Unity Script/PlayerInventory
CSprojects.description: Player Inventory script made for Unity in C#(self-made). Can be used for basically any game. Mainly made for First Person Shooters. Moderate functioning with Third Person games.

CSprojects.title: Unity Script/PlayerWeaponScript
CSprojects.description: Player Weapon script made for Unity in C#(self-made). Made for First Person Shooter games. Can possibly work with First Person Shooter games(decent functionality).

CSprojects.title: Unity Script/ItemScript
CSprojects.description: Item script made for Unity by me(self-made). Made for any type of game. Basic, but works.

PYprojects.title: Python/Full Body Tracking
PYprojects.description: A 'Full Body Tracking' program for VR in Python, which uses mediapipe and numpy, along with cv2, making it possible to do Full Body Tracking with Mobile. This project was ended rather early, due to the lack of motivation and other alternatives available online.

SQLprojects.title: SQL/App Database
SQLprojects.description: This is an SQL code of a project of mine, which is still in a very early planning phase.
